# spacelift_default_runner_image (Resource)

`spacelift_default_runner_image` represents the default runner images that will be used for public and private worker pools.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `private` (String) Runner image to be used for private worker pools
- `public` (String) Runner image to be used for public worker pools

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
